meanings.sent1: She spent hours reenvisioning her future after receiving unexpected news.
meanings.sent2: The artist is reenvisioning the mural to include more vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The children had fun reenvisioning their favorite fairy tales with a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: Reenvisioning the problem as a puzzle helped him find a creative solution.
meanings.sent5: By reenvisioning the garden layout, she transformed the space into a peaceful retreat.

meanings.definition: The act of imagining or conceiving something in a new way.
meanings.sent1: His reenvisioning of the company's branding strategy brought great success.
meanings.sent2: The reenvisioning of the city park attracted many visitors with its innovative design.
meanings.sent3: The reenvisioning of the classic story as a comedy made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her reenvisioning of the traditional recipe resulted in a delicious new dish.
meanings.sent5: The reenvisioning of the old building into a modern office space was truly impressive.
